meanings.definition: Treat with gradually increasing doses of an allergen to reduce sensitivity.
meanings.sent1: To build immunity, the doctor will hyposensitize the patient to peanuts.
meanings.sent2: They decided to hyposensitize the dog to reduce allergic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The chef hyposensitized himself to spicy food by eating a little each day.
meanings.sent4: The team hyposensitized their goalie to pressure by practicing penalty shots.
meanings.sent5: The therapist hyposensitized the patient to fear by exposing them to small doses of it.
